name: Dark Wartortle
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: A Pokémon with a negative attitude, it hides in its shell whenever it’s in a bad mood—which is often.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mirror Shell
attacks.effect: If an attack does damage to Dark Wartortle during your opponent’s next turn (even if Dark Wartortle is Knocked Out), Dark Wartortle does an equal amount of damage to the Defending Pokémon.
